passives.name: Noxian Haste
passives.effects: {{tip|heal|Healing}}, {{tip|shield|shielding}} or buffing an ally, damaging abilities against champions, and using [[summoner spell]]s grants you {{as|{{rd|10%|8%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds. This can be triggered from the same {{tip|cast instance}} only once every 4 seconds.
